Sub: Issuance of Completion Certilieate or Provisional Completion Certificate int respect of PPP Projects: The issuance of Completien Certificate Or Provisional  Completion Certificate in respect of PPP Projects was deliberated by the Executive Committee in its 238" meeting held on 23.04.2015 and it waS decided that  henceforth the Completion Certificate/Provisional Certilicate for PPP projects shall be issued by the IE without seeking prior clearance from NHA[ Or any Other Authority aS per the relevant provisions Of the Concession Agreement: 2 lt was also deeided that the instructions may be issued by the concerned Technical Division to the  IEs appointed  for PPP projects under their jurisdiction a5 per the letter approved by the Competent Authority (copy enelosed) Accordingly all Technical Divisions are requested t0 issue the enclosed letter to the IEs appointed for PPP projects under their jurisdiction. 3 This has the approval of Competent Authority.
